Project.Brief history of your project and organi:
Huawen Yingxiang (Beijing) Film Co., Ltd. was established in 2017 and is a company dedicated to film and television project investment and production.

Through years of dedicated exploration in the film industry, Huawen Yingxiang has successively participated in the investment and production of more than 100 outstanding film and television works. The global cumulative box office of these works has exceeded 70 billion yuan, including numerous films that have achieved both commercial success and critical acclaim. Notable examples include: *The Battle at Lake Changjin*, *The Battle at Lake Changjin II*, *Lost in the Stars*, *Creation of the Gods I*, *This Killer Is Not Bad*, *Hi, Mom*, *The Wandering Earth 2*, *Moonfall*, *Detective Chinatown 3*, *Hot & Cool*, *Pegasus*, *Meg*, and many other excellent domestic and international film and television productions.
